trans-unit.source: Each property of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemIcons" /> class is an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object for Windows system-wide icons.
trans-unit.target: Cada propriedade da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemIcons" /> é um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> para ícones gerais do sistema Windows.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to load a bitmap from an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> handle, using the <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit> enumeration, and the use of the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Round%2A> method to draw the rectangle bounds of a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como carregar um bitmap de um <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> tratar, usando o <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit> enumeração e o uso do <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Round%2A> método para desenhar os limites do retângulo de um bitmap.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com o Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Create a form that contains a button named Button2.
trans-unit.target: Crie um formulário que contém um botão chamado Button2.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and associate this method with the button's `Click` event.
trans-unit.target: Cole o código no formulário e associar esse método com o botão `Click` eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the default application icon (WIN32: IDI_APPLICATION).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> que contém o ícone do aplicativo padrão (WIN32: IDI_APPLICATION).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the default application icon.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> que contém o ícone do aplicativo padrão.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the system asterisk icon (WIN32: IDI_ASTERISK).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> que contém o ícone de asterisco do sistema (WIN32: IDI_ASTERISK).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the system asterisk icon.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> objeto que contém o ícone de asterisco do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the system error icon (WIN32: IDI_ERROR).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> que contém o ícone de erro do sistema (WIN32: IDI_ERROR).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the system error icon.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> objeto que contém o ícone de erro do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the system exclamation icon (WIN32: IDI_EXCLAMATION).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> que contém o ícone de exclamação do sistema (WIN32: IDI_EXCLAMATION).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the system exclamation icon.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> que contém o ícone de exclamação do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the system hand icon (WIN32: IDI_HAND).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> objeto que contém o ícone de mão do sistema (WIN32: IDI_HAND).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the system hand icon.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> objeto que contém o ícone de mão do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the system information icon (WIN32: IDI_INFORMATION).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> que contém o ícone de informações do sistema (WIN32: IDI_INFORMATION).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the system information icon.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> que contém o ícone de informações do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the system question icon (WIN32: IDI_QUESTION).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> objeto que contém o ícone de pergunta do sistema (WIN32: IDI_QUESTION).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the system question icon.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> objeto que contém o ícone de pergunta do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the shield icon.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> que contém o ícone de escudo.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the shield icon.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> que contém o ícone de escudo.

trans-unit.source: The User Account Control (UAC) guidelines recommend the use of the shield icon next to or on any control whose default action is to require an elevation to administrator privileges.
trans-unit.target: As diretrizes de controle de conta de usuário (UAC) recomendam o uso do ícone de escudo lado ou em qualquer controle ação cujo padrão é exigir uma elevação de privilégios de administrador.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "User Account Control" section of the "Windows Vista User Experience Guidelines" on MSDN.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a seção "Controle de conta de usuário", "Windows Vista usuário diretrizes de experiência do" no MSDN.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the system warning icon (WIN32: IDI_WARNING).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> que contém o ícone de aviso do sistema (WIN32: IDI_WARNING).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the system warning icon.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> que contém o ícone de aviso do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the Windows logo icon (WIN32: IDI_WINLOGO).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> objeto que contém o ícone de logotipo do Windows (WIN32: IDI_WINLOGO).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> object that contains the Windows logo icon.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> objeto que contém o ícone de logotipo do Windows.
